mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERPROGRAM SET PROCHECK=#{proCheck} WHERE MPNUM=#{mpNum}
mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT MP.MPNUM, MP.USERNAME, MP.PROCHECK, MP.PROSTATE, M.NAME FROM PROGRAM P INNER JOIN MEMBERPROGRAM MP ON P.PRONUM = MP.PRONUM INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON MP.USERNAME = M.USERNAME WHERE P.PRONUM=${proNum}) N, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) B
mapper.update: UPDATE PROGRAM SET RECSTATUS=#{recStatus} WHERE PRONUM=#{proNum}
mapper.select: SELECT PRONUM, PROCATE, RECSTATUS, PROTITLE, PROCONTENTS, TARGET, TOTAL, PRSDATE, PRLDATE, DATE_FORMAT(PSDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as psDt, DATE_FORMAT(PLDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as plDt, DATE_FORMAT(PSDATE,'%H:%i') as psTime, DATE_FORMAT(PLDATE,'%H:%i') as plTime, PROTEACHER, PROPLACE FROM PROGRAM WHERE PRONUM = #{proNum}

SELECT PRONUM, PROCATE, RECSTATUS, PROTITLE, TARGET, TOTAL, PRSDATE, PRLDATE, DATE_FORMAT(PSDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as psDt, DATE_FORMAT(PLDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as plDt, PROTEACHER, PROPLACE FROM PROGRAM WHERE PROTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
AND PROCATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search1}, '%')
AND RECSTATUS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search2}, '%')
ORDER BY PRONUM DESC limit #{startRow}, #{perPage};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROGRAM (PRONUM, PROCATE, RECSTATUS, PROTITLE, PROCONTENTS, TARGET, TOTAL, PRSDATE, PRLDATE, PSDATE, PLDATE, PROTEACHER, PROPLACE) VALUES (#{proNum}, #{proCate}, '예정', #{proTitle}, #{proContents}, #{target}, #{total}, #{prsDate}, #{prlDate}, STR_TO_DATE(#{psDt}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), STR_TO_DATE(#{plDt}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), #{proTeacher}, #{proPlace})
